New Records: Dunith Wellalage claimed a five-wicket haul in the match
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka beat India by 110 runs to win the series 2-0
Sri Lanka scored 248/7 in their innings
India's batting performance was dismal with key players failing
Pre-Game Insights: India and Sri Lanka were in a competitive series
Sri Lanka's spinners were crucial in the match
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka clinched the series with a dominant victory
India's batting order struggled throughout the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the third and final ODI of the series
The series win was significant for Sri Lanka
